no_events: No events found for this sensor!
page_desc:
Sensor Information
The graph is a dynamic representation of the Sensor readings.
Change Thresholds (if supported)
Click ‘Change Thresholds’ to configure threshold settings. Enter the desired threshold values.
Note: The threshold settings button will be enabled only for administrator or operator privilege users. For other users, the option will be disabled. And if all threshold value are not settable or not readable, it will be disabled.
Sensor Events
This section displays all the event entries for this sensor in a reverse chronological order.
